body_html: I've seen a similar repeating pattern with Lua/Torch7, while I was using versions of CUDA/cuDNN which had a bug that affecting calculations. Though this only occurred when I was using an extremely large image size. But I've also come across such a pattern with flawed code.

body: I've seen a similar repeating pattern with Lua/Torch7, while I was using versions of CUDA/cuDNN which had a bug that affecting calculations. Though this only occurred when I was using an extremely large image size.  But I've also come across such a pattern with flawed code.
